attributes.action: Request that WSCC provide road markings and signs on the approach from Bognor A259 in to Chichester using the Bognor Road (Quarry Lane) roundabout
attributes.additional_details: Please provide lane markings and signs to ensure drivers use the correct lane on the A259 approach to the Bognor Road roundabout. This roundabout has been the scene of both accidents and potential accidents due to confusion over which lane to use.
